Description: Body sherd of East Greek (possibly Chian) pottery Ionian cup with everted rim; white slip; interior glazed streaky black with two added white bands below rim; exterior: trace of glaze at upper break, lip and handle zone reserved with band between; glazed below.
Curator's comments: The fabric is thicker and the shape squatter than other clearly Chian cups.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1910) (phase 2)
